description: Second-half goals from David McGoldrick, Nick Tsaroulla, and Will Jarvis earn promotion-chasing Notts County victory over MK Dons.
title: League Two: Notts County 3-0 Milton Keynes Dons
title_page: League Two: Notts County 3-0 Milton Keynes Dons - Magpies close on top three - BBC Sport
maintext:
Notts County have won just two of their 19 league games against MK Dons (D5 L12), though did win the reverse fixture in December 2-0.
MK Dons are unbeaten across their last six away league games against Notts Couty (W4 D2), scoring two goals-per-game on average across that time.
Notts County have lost two of their last three home league games (D1), one more than their previous 11 beforehand (W7 D3 L1).
MK Dons have picked up four points in their last two away league games (W1 D1), as many as their previous 10 on the road beforehand (W1 D1 L8).
